alert.note: Alert for Union (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 9:50AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Hardin, northern Pope, southern Saline, Gallatin and southwestern Union Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 849 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Harrisburg to 8 miles south of Carrier Mills. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Eldorado around 855 AM CDT. Equality around 905 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Ridgway, Shawneetown and Rosiclare. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
